title: 3 BR/3 BA luxury condo available 10/1/22-5/31/23
posting_body: This high end, fully furnished condo is an 8 minute walk to Davis Square.
Available from October 1st to May 31st, this sun splashed condo offers high ceilings and an open and airy layout.

Features include: maple floors, gourmet kitchen with stainless appliances, granite counter tops, master bedroom with en suite bath and 6' soaking tub, living room with fireplace, in-unit laundry, patio, back deck, family room with wet bar and pool table and 1 garage parking space.
Furnishings include linens, towels, fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bicycles that you are welcome to use.
Enjoy living on a quiet side street a short walk to restaurants, shops, parks, entertainment venues and the T. Available October 1, 2022 through May 31, 2023
